title: 📊 Market Intel — Mon Feb 16 2026 6:00 PM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel — Mon Feb 16, 2026 @ 6:00 PM ET

**Top Headlines: US Jobs Revised Down 1M+ | Crypto Bleeding | WBD-Paramount $108B Deal Back On | AI Software Selloff Hits $1.5T Credit Market | Gold Near $5,000**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **US 2025 jobs numbers revised down by over 1 million** — massive revision shaking confidence in labor market strength (24K+ upvotes on WSB)
- **AI software selloff may pose risk for $1.5T US credit market** — Morgan Stanley warns AI-led software names dragging down credit (2.6K WSB)
- **Warner Bros reconsiders Paramount $108B sale** after revised offer covers $2.8B Netflix breakup fee (3K WSB)
- **Crypto market drowning in red** — BTC falling, ETH hit with $540M sell wave, McGlone warns BTC could hit $10K
- **Gold approaching $5,000/oz** ($4,990) as safe-haven demand surges

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

- **S&P 500:** 6,836.17 (+0.05%) — flat, Presidents' Day thin volume
- **Nasdaq:** 22,546.67 (-0.22%) — slight red, tech pressure continues
- **Dow:** 49,500.93 (+0.10%)
- **Nikkei 225:** 56,806 (-0.24%) — Japan GDP released, Takaichi consolidating power
- **FTSE 100:** 10,473.69 (+0.26%)
- **Western Digital (WDC)** — 2026 HDD capacity 100% sold out, hyperscaler AI data center cloud = 89% of revenue (WSB buzzing)
- **Pentagon threatens to label Anthropic AI a "supply chain risk"** — big implications for AI defense contracts
- **SpaceX & xAI competing in Pentagon autonomous drone tech contest**
- **Alphabet (GOOGL)** — "always red in February" meme circulating, concerns about AI strategy
- **Spotify (SPOT)** — $100K YOLO call play trending on WSB
- **$ZIM** — buyout rumor fueling YOLO plays

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **Bitcoin** under pressure — McGlone (Bloomberg) warns could fall to $10K on US recession risk; Strategy (fka MicroStrategy) says it can survive BTC at $8K
- **Ether** steadying after $540M sell wave, rebounding toward $2,000
- **Harvard cuts BTC exposure 20%, adds new ETH position** — institutional rotation signal
- **Hong Kong** approves first crypto company license since June (Victory Fintech)
- **Nexo re-enters US market** 3 years after exit, partnering with Bakkt
- **OKX** snags European payments license for stablecoin/crypto card expansion
- **Russia daily crypto turnover >$650M** per Ministry of Finance
- **Metaplanet** operating profit to rise 81% in 2026 despite $650M BTC valuation loss
- **Animoca Brands** gets Dubai broker-dealer license
- **SVB says "this is crypto's year of integration"** — bank-led stablecoins, tokenized T-bills, AI wallets
- **CZ and Consensus panelists:** lack of privacy blocking crypto adoption
- **Crypto Week Ahead:** Hive & Riot earnings, Fed rate-decision minutes

---

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- **SpaceX and xAI to compete in Pentagon contest for autonomous drone tech** — defense AI play heating up
- No major Tesla-specific news today; market closed for Presidents' Day

---

## 💻 Hacker News / Tech

- **#1: 14-year-old Miles Wu's origami pattern holds 10K times its own weight** (281 pts) — emergency shelter design
- **#2: "Self-generated Agent Skills are useless"** — arxiv paper (88 pts, hot debate in AI agent community)
- **Bluetooth privacy concerns** — "What your Bluetooth devices reveal" (256 pts)
- **"Jemini — Gemini for the Epstein Files"** (189 pts) — AI tool to search Epstein documents
- **Visual Introduction to PyTorch** (72 pts)
- **Free alternative to Wispr Flow/Superwhisper** — open-source voice typing (31 pts)
- **"10 years building vertical software: are we cooked?"** — debate on AI eating vertical SaaS
- **Show HN: Wildex — Pokémon Go for real wildlife** (40 pts)

---

## 🦍 Reddit / WSB

**Hot on WSB:**
- 🏆 **"I'm in love with Nancy Pelosi"** (2K⬆) — Gain post: user copied every Pelosi trade since Dec 2023 ($NVDA, $PANW, $AMZN, $TEM, $GOOGL, $AVGO, $VST), also DCA'ing $USAR copying Trump admin trades
- **US jobs revised down 1M+** (24K⬆) — biggest post of the day
- **AI software selloff / $1.5T credit risk** (2.6K⬆) — Morgan Stanley warning
- **WBD-Paramount $108B deal** (3K⬆)
- **$SPOT $100K YOLO calls** (353⬆) — "need to make last year's losses back"
- **Quantum computing discussion** (244⬆) — "playable event in our lifetime?"
- **Silver short loss porn** (870⬆) — 45K lost, capitulated near the top
- **$ZIM buyout rumor play** (190⬆)

**Hot on r/stocks:**
- **Space stocks bubble debate** (396⬆)
- **"Roaring 20s" parallels** (394⬆)
- **Data center buildout** thesis (155⬆)
- **Carvana (CVNA) subprime loan concerns** (144⬆)
- **"2026 top losers in my portfolio"** — hindsight thread (147⬆)
- **Google AI danger** discussion — risk of "blowing its own feet"

**r/CryptoCurrency:**
- Concordium AMA on privacy as crypto's next unlock
- General bearish sentiment matching CoinDesk tone

---

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

- **Presidents' Day — light sports slate**
- **NBA:** No games today; next games Thursday 2/19:
  - HOU @ CHA (HOU -2.5, O/U 214.5) — KD 25.8 PPG
  - BKN @ CLE (CLE -13.5, O/U 228.5) — Mitchell 29.0 PPG
  - ATL @ PHI (PHI -4.5, O/U 236.5) — Maxey 28.9 PPG
  - IND @ WSH (battle of bottom-feeders)
- **NCAA Basketball:** Live games on ESPN
- **MLB Spring Training** approaching — Olney's top 10 starters ranking out (Skubal vs Skenes debate)
- **Winter Olympics (Milan-Cortina)** coverage ramping up on ESPN

---

## 💎 Commodities & Macro

- **Gold: $4,990/oz** (-0.64%) — hovering just under $5K, massive safe-haven bid
- **Brent Crude: $68.59** (+1.24%)
- **Copper: $1,199** (-0.87%)
- **US 10Y: 4.048%** (-0.008) — yields drifting lower
- **EUR/USD: 1.1850** — dollar weakening
- **GBP/USD: 1.3622**
- **Japan GDP released** — Takaichi consolidating power, political shift
- **Fed Minutes due this week** — key catalyst for rate expectations

---

## 🌍 What X Is Talking About

- **Pelosi trade copying** going viral again — WSB post showing massive gains
- **AI supply chain risk** — Pentagon vs Anthropic raising national security questions
- **"Are we in a bubble?"** discourse intensifying — space stocks, AI software, parallels to Roaring 20s
- **Epstein files AI tool** trending on HN/tech Twitter
- **Silver bears getting destroyed** — loss porn circulating
- **Quantum computing hype** — WSB debating if it's investable yet

---

*Sources: Reuters, CoinDesk, Hacker News, Reddit (WSB/stocks/crypto), ESPN, DraftKings odds*
*Scanned: Mon Feb 16, 2026 @ 6:00 PM ET*
